DOC.brief_summary: The traditional weight loss diet recommend health professional low-fat , high-carbohydrate , calorie restrict diet . This recommendation challenge number alternative dietary strategy , particularly low-carbohydrate diet . In several recent weight loss study insulin resistant adult success low- vs. high-carbohydrate diet , contrast insulin sensitive adult either success comparable success low-fat diet . The investigator plan enroll 80 people wide range insulin sensitivity/resistance . After determine insulin resistance status , investigator split middle randomly assign one four group : ( 1 ) Low-Carbohydrate/Insulin Resistant ( LC/IR ) ; ( 2 ) Low-Carbohydrate/Insulin Sensitive ( LC/IS ) ; ( 3 ) Low-Fat/Insulin Resistant ( LF/IR ) ; ( 4 ) Low-Fat/Insulin Sensitive ( LF/IS ) ( 20 people/group ) . The purpose study determine whether weight loss success increase one follow dietary approach appropriately match insulin resistance status .
DOC.brief_title: Weight Loss Diet Study : Low Carb v Low Fat
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator hope learn whether match weight loss diet one 's insulin resistance status increase weight loss success . The relevance finding highlight fact national recommendation weight loss follow high-carbohydrate , low-fat diet . This would imply half population give wrong advice regard successful dietary pattern weight loss .
